input_text.Prompt:
Given a product name and product specifications, this program will generate exciting product descriptions.

Product name:
Pavilion Gift Company 19062 Light Your Way Memorial Forever in Our Hearts Angel Figurine, 4-1/2-Inch

Product specifications:
Reads "Forever in our hearts"
High quality polyresin construction
Comes in an attractive gift box
Memorial Gift
input_text.Response A: When someone we love becomes a memory, that memory becomes a treasure. Light Your Way Memorial from Pavilion Gift Company is a beautiful line of home and garden treasures created to keep our loved ones' memories alive while brightening our hearts and home. When you need to express your sympathy for someone in mourning, this heartfelt collection provides a sincere tribute. The warm yet subtle earth tones complemented by symbolic blue forget-me-nots and compassionate sentiment will bring the memory of a loved one to life.
input_text.Response B: The Pavilion Gift Company Light Your Way Memorial Forever in Our Hearts Angel Figurine is a beautiful and heartwarming memorial gift for someone who has lost a loved one. The angel figurine is made of high quality polyresin and features a gentle expression and a serene pose. The figurine is inscribed with the touching words "Forever in our hearts" and comes in an attractive gift box. This angel figurine is a thoughtful and comforting gift for someone who has lost a loved one and is dealing with grief.

label_annotations.feedback: A) changed information in the request, it was a single item not a collection so erred quite badly and made up stuff.  B) added some flowery descriptions about the figurine that were not in the request.
